scripts.build_sc: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.client:build: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.go: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run server:install  && npm run client:build
scripts.start: npm run build &&  cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.start1: npm run build &&  npm install && npm run start:prod
